Taking inspiration from Bengaluru, her history, geography, culture, and most importantly her stories, love.OORU was born as an identity rooted in Bengaluru and all it has to offer.

document.short_description:
Woodcut Printing Beginners Workshop - by Studio Sakura


We’ll be teaching a black and white composition. If you have a composition in mind that you want to work on, you can get the sketch or a print out of it. If you don’t have anything specific in mind, you can choose from the references we have.


You take home your carved block with 1 print. If you wish to print more editions, you can print it at our studio using our etching press in Brigade road. 🖼️


✨All the materials will be provided. The tools will be provided only for use. 


No prior experience required, we will teach you from scratch.

Join us to unleash your creativity and experience the magic of printmaking.


Studio Sakura- Art Studio

Run by artists Monica & Kapila. Follow them on Instagram @studiosakura.blr

document.short_description:
Letterpress Printmaking Workshop by PRINTING WITH TYPES


Come & Experience the art of letterpress with us at love OORU, a cosy rooftop located at Koramangala. A bespoke workshop to get to know about letterpress - history, process and craft of printing by hand on an antique press. The session will focus on hand setting the metal type the old fashioned way, making a composition and printing your own piece of typographic art.


- Beginner level workshop. 

- No prior experience needed. 

- All tools would be provided for use only.


- Printed article can be carried along, materials and types will be provided for workshop use only - not to take home.

Get ready to sip, swirl, and savor the world's finest wines on 22nd and 23rd June at Pebbles, Bangalore. Remember to bring your ticket and ID for entry. Let the future speak wine! See you there!
document.cancellation_policy:
Terms and Conditions:


1. Entry: Valid ticket required; keep your wine glass throughout; entry between 11am – 10pm on 22nd - 23rd June.

2. Age Restrictions: Must be 21+ with valid ID for wine tastings.

3. Coupon Use: Each coupon valid for one tasting; non-transferable and non-redeemable for cash.

4. Conduct: Organizers may refuse entry or remove intoxicated/inappropriate attendees; drink responsibly.

5. Purchases: Additional wines and foods available at special prices; pay directly at counters.

6. Personal Belongings: Organizers not liable for loss, damage, or theft of personal items.

7. Cancellations and Refunds: Tickets non-refundable; full refund if event is canceled by organizers.

8. Photography and Media: Attendees consent to being photographed/filmed for promotional use.

9. Liability: Organizers not responsible for any injuries, accidents, or damages during the event.


By purchasing a ticket, attendees agree to these terms and conditions. Enjoy UnWined responsibly and let the future speak wine!

document.name: Unwine'd - Wine Festival
document.short_description:
Unwine'd by The Blend Community


Date: 22nd - 23rd June  

Timings: 11am – 10pm  

Venue: Pebbles, Bangalore   


Pouring Over the Details: 

Join us for Unwine'd, an exclusive wine festival in Bangalore that promises an immersive experience with multiple wines from across the globe. Delight in unique wine styles, regional offerings, and exquisite gourmet food pairings. This vibrant event is filled with themed activities, fun games, and live entertainment. Each attendee receives a beautiful wine glass souvenir and tasting coupons for all showcased wines. Engage with fellow wine enthusiasts, partake in educational workshops, and create unforgettable memories.


Highlights:

- Wine Tastings: Sample a diverse range of wines from local and international vineyards.

- Gourmet Pairings: Enjoy artisanal cheeses, chocolates, and gourmet foods.

- Live Music: Dance and relax to foot-tapping music.

- Workshops & Seminars: Learn from wine experts in engaging sessions.

- Artisanal Crafts: Explore handcrafted goods and wine accessories.

- Relaxation Zones: Unwind in scenic, comfortable seating areas.


Special Experiences:

- Grape Stomping: Channel your inner winemaker.

- DIY Wine Cocktails: Create custom wine-based drinks.

- Celebrity Chef's Tables: Enjoy culinary journeys with renowned chefs.

- Wine Blending: Craft your unique wine blend.


Join us at Unwine'd for a celebration of wine, culture, and community. Let the future speak wine!

document.name: Carnival 2.0 - An exclusive Taste & Buy affair

custom_questions.question: Gender
Age
Where did you hear about us?

document.short_description:
The Wine Community BLR is a group of young wine enthusiasts keen on uplifting the wine scene in the city. We believe in breaking age-old stereotypes whilst making wine approachable, interesting and fun for all. After 21 successful themed chapters since the group’s inception in 2022, we are excited to be hosting our 22nd chapter in all its glory for a much larger crowd in the city with Carnival 2.0!

Check out our Instagram handle @winecommunityblr to get an overview of what we have accomplished over the last 21 months. We are as excited as you are and look forward to seeing you at our Carnival in June. Cheers!


Highlights

  • Timings for the Carnival 2.0 on 9th of June are from 3pm - 10pm.
  • It is an exclusive “Taste & Buy” affair with a beautiful selection of both Indian & Imported wines.
  • Each ticket holder will be offered a wine glass at the entry.
  • We request each attendee to hold on to this glass for use throughout their time at the Carnival 2.0, as there will be no replacements.
  • A ticket holder will receive coupons at the time of their entry to access all wine stalls. This includes one coupon per wine stall, against all participating brands.
  • Each coupon represents the wine brands/ the wines being offered at each counter and offers you a tasting pour of wines from the respective brand’s counter.
  • Attendees can also purchase wines at a flat 25% discount on their MRPs at the Carnival 2.0. This special offer is valid for purchases at the venue only on the 9th June.
  • Upon entry, each ticket holder will also receive two food coupons in denominations of Rs 250/- which can be redeemed at the exclusive food counter, offering a delectable variety from The PARK Bangalore.
  • Additional food items can be purchased at exciting prices & paid for directly at the counter.


We have a line up of exciting sessions for the curious minded folks. Feel free to sign up for any of the 4 sessions that we have in store from some of the most prominent personnel.


PLEASE CLICK ANY OF THE BELOW LINKS TO FIND YOUR WAY TO AN EXCITING SESSION ON WINES THAT DAY:

  1. Learn About Wine - A comparative guidance to WSET & CMS credentials
  2. Almost famous by Ruma Singh (DipWSET)
  3. Wine 101: Tarini Kumar (Founder, Wine In a Million)
  4. Influence of Oak in Winemaking - Gaurav Thapar (Karnataka Grape & Wine Board)


Our trusted media partner will be ARB STUDIOS who also has judiciously covered the last 21 chapters for us. Check out @architrb on Instagram to browse through some of the fabulous work they do.

default_section.label: What's included
default_section.text:
One coupon per stall, against all participating brands (12-15 wine brands).
 A fair tasting pour for all valid ticket holders against the coupon redeemed at respective brand stalls.
A wide selection of exciting Indian & International wines from our beverage partners that are currently available in Bangalore.
Delectable food from our food/ hospitality partner, i.e. The PARK Bangalore.
An opportunity to purchase any wines available at a special discounted price on MRP (25% off!).
Good Music. Great Wine. Fun Company. Exciting Overall Experience!

default_section.label: What's not
default_section.text:
Unlimited pours of wines being served for tasting that day. Please respect the discretion of each stall.
Extra glassware as highlighted.
Access to other hotel areas except the poolside.
Permission to hand carry or bring your own alcohol and/or food.

document.name: Pasta Shop with Chef Goku

document.short_description:
Pasta Shop at The Conservatory!


Our glasshouse is transforming into a pasta shop for just two days. Experience pastas like never before from our menu featuring different types of handcrafted pastas curated by Chef Goku.


Chef Goku is a graduate of The Culinary Institute of America. He has worked at Dominique Ansel Bakery, Aureole, The Clock Tower, Junoon, Rezdora in New York, and Blackbird in Chicago. Currently, he conducts pop-ups and curated dinners in Chennai under the brand name Hygge By Chef Goku. Additionally, he oversees the pastry kitchens Chokolat Culture and Maison Indulgence.


MENU FOR THE PASTA SHOP


ANTIPASTI

 

Stracciatella Incontra Togo (Rs. 490)

Stracciatella Cheese, Togo Tomatoes, Heirloom Cherry Tomato Confit, Basil Oil, BalsamicReduction, Orange wedges, Arugula Served with Fett’ Unta.

 

Cacio E Pepe Wedge Salad  (Rs. 420)

Lettuce Wedge, Pecorino Dressing, Cracked Black Pepper.

 

Passatelli In Brodo (Rs. 420)

Parmesan Broth, Passatelli, White Truffle Oil, Cracked Black Pepper.

  

PASTA 

 

Tagliatelle Al Ragu (Rs. 770)

From Modena (Chef’s Special Short Rib Ragu).

 

Garganelli Al Ragu (Rs. 700) (V)

From Napoli (Chef’s Special Neapolitan Mushroom Ragu).

 

Strozzapreti (Rs. 665)

Creamy Tuscan Sauce with Chicken and Sun-Dried Tomato.

 

Anolini Di Parma (Rs. 770)

Traditional Lamb Meat Filling with Parmigiano Reggiano Sauce, Balsamic Reduction.

 

Ode To Rezdora (Rs. 700) (V)

Cappelletti Verde With Roasted, Sauteed Leeks and Black Mushroom Puree.

 

Agnolotti (Rs. 665) (V)

Agnolotti, Mixed Vegetables, Manchego, Brown Butter, Pumpkin.

 

Tortelli Di Parma (Rs. 665) (V)

Ricotta, Spinach, Herbs, Sun-Dried Tomato, Parmigiano Reggiano, Butter. 

 

Lobster Head Bisque  (Rs. 770)

Linguine, Lobster head Bisque sauce, Grilled Shrimp, Banana pepper.

 

Spring Gnocchi (Rs. 700) (V)

Peas, Asparagus Coins, Sage, Butter, Parmigiano Reggiano, Lemon Zest.

 

DOLCI 

 

Tipsy Tiramisu (Rs. 490)

Tipsy For two, better for one

 

Torta D’ Oliva (Rs. 560)

Olive Oil Cake with Stracciatella Ice Cream

 

Risotto Rice Pannacotta (Rs. 490)

Textures of Mango


Terms and Conditions:

  • The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an event.
  • Do not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.
  • Each slot, lasting 2 hours only, requires attendance at the booked time, with no accommodation for attendance at any other slot except the one booked.
  • No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.
  • Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.
  • The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.
  • Children over 7 years of age require a ticket.
  • Children below the age of 7 are not allowed.
  • No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.
  • Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.
  • Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.
  • The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval of theirs.

account_data.company_description: Immerse yourself in an era gone by...

document.booking_confirmation_message:
Hi there!


We are so excited to take you on an exciting journey, travelling back in time, visiting an era gone by!


Here is the link to our location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/cPznXQ7hgfugF5sf8?g_st=iw


A few things to keep in mind. As most of these vehicles are over a 100 years old and extremely delicate, we do not allow for guests to sit inside, however you are most welcome to take photographs.


As the tour involves a lot of walking through an estate surrounded by a beautiful canopy of trees, please wear comfortable shoes.

If the weather forecast mentions rain, please carry an umbrella.


We can't wait to share our portal into the past with you!


See you soon!


Warmly,

Rupali

document.cancellation_policy:
Refunds:

Refunds will be issued only in cases where the event is cancelled by the organizers. Refund requests made by attendees will be considered up to 2 days prior to the event date. A processing fee may apply to refund requests initiated by attendees. Refunds will be processed within 2 business days after approval.

Cancellations:

Attendees must notify the organizers of any cancellations at least 2 days before the event date. Cancellations made after the specified deadline may not be eligible for a refund. The organizers reserve the right to cancel or reschedule the event due to unforeseen circumstances. In such cases, attendees will be notified promptly, and refunds will be issued accordingly.

Transfer of Tickets:

Tickets are non-transferable without prior approval from the organizers. Requests for ticket transfers must be made in writing and approved by the organizers.

No-show Policy:

Attendees who do not show up for the event without prior notice will not be eligible for a refund. By registering for the event, attendees agree to abide by the refund and cancellation policy outlined above. The organizers reserve the right to amend or update this policy as necessary.

account_data.company_description: Bookmark is a dating app for readers. It connects people based on not just what books they like, but also other attributes and interests about their personality, distance, the relationship they are seeking, gender preferences, and more. Download and try it today!

document.address: 167, GROUND FLOOR BACK PORTION 2nd Stage, 2nd cross, Shankarnag Rd, Stage 2, Domlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560071, India
document.booking_confirmation_message:
We can't wait to meet you at Sip & Read! The venue is C+C's gorgeous new space called, "The Studio". In case you're unable to locate, it's right above "Chakra Athletica". It's in the 4th floor of the building that houses Brush and Blush Salon.


Please arrive promptly at 5 PM, so we can spend an hour of silent reading. We'll have our own library of books for you to choose from. Or you can get your books too. All food is plant-based and all beverages are non-alcoholic.


Come with a gentle appetite and an open mind to meeting new people. Leave your phones to rest, so that you can unwind in the company of other like-minded folks.


There is very limited parking in nearby side streets so please take a cab if possible. We also don't have valet parking.


About Bookmark App: It is India's first-ever dating app for readers founded by the same folks who started Cubbon Reads! Your DP remains hidden until you match with someone and exchange ten messages with them. While books and reading interests become the core connecting point, it also matches people through the base location, the relationship status, gender preferences, and more.


About The Studio by Copper+Cloves: A new community space in Indiranagar, Bangalore. It will be hosting events every weekend, and yoga, sound healing, pilates and more on most other days. The in-house cafe will be your loved Copper+Cloves.
document.cancellation_policy:
1. The ticket includes inclusions mentioned in the ticket.
  2. F&B from outside will not be permitted.
  3. No refunds on purchased tickets are possible.
  4. All the pictures & videos captured during the community events (hosted by Bookmark App individually and/or in partnership with other brands) will be used on social media by Bookmark App as well as partner brands for organic & performance marketing purposes in the form of (but not limited to) posts, reels, videos, ad content, posters, on websites, blogs, PR coverage. Please inform us upto 12 hours prior to the event via WhatsApp (+91 7042683457) incase you do not wish to be photographed. 
  5. You agree to share information entered on this page with Bookmark App (owner of this page) and Razorpay, and partner brands, adhering to applicable laws.

document.short_description:
Copper+Cloves & Bookmark App are hosting a Sip & Read party at the stunning new The Studio by Copper+Cloves space!🍹📕


Come hang with us—grab a book and then join our fun social mixer! Enjoy C+C’s tasty nibbles and cool, non-alcoholic drinks.


Bring whatever you're reading (paperback, Kindle, magazine, or newspaper) or, pick a new book from our library and discover something fresh.


After that, we break into some fun conversations with creative prompts, share book recommendations and maybe even swap a few reads! 


Bring your best vibes, set your phone to silent, and enjoy a fun evening with us.


📚 Get cozy with a good book alongside fellow readers

💬 Jump into lively convos 

🍷 Enjoy a complimentary drink

🥕 Snack on delicious bites

☀️ All happening at Copper+Cloves' newest space, designed for community gatherings


Bonus: Free Bookmark Premium membership!

Xacuti & Chill with Chefs Rhea Aaron & Tushar Sood


Amuse

Oyster & Balchao


1st Course

Ros Omelette 

Egg, Xacuti, Mini Poee & Red Onion Salsa


2nd Course

Carpaccio

Squid/Octopus, Kokum-Ponzu dressing, Kismoor, Fish Curry & Fresh Jalapeno


3rd Course

Puff

Beef Roast, Sour cream, Curry leaf, Pickled onion & Gravy 


4th Course

Gambas & Choriz Moçambique 

Podi dusted Prawns, Choriz Chilli fry, Choriz Fat Brioche, Confit Garlic & Dill-Caper aioli 


Mains


Slow Cooked Pork Shoulder, Crispy Okra, Bacon-Scallion Verde, Vindaloo Veloute & Coconut Rice 


OR


Steak Recheado 

Recheado butter basted Filet Mignon, Vichyssoise espuma, Drumstick, Tomato Confit & Pickled Shallots & Cilantro oil

 

Dessert 

Pasteis De Nata 

Ulo Vanilla Bean Ice Cream & Apple Crumble 


Come with an appetite!

document.short_description:
It's Just Brunch with Chefs Gautam & Aarohi Sanghavi


East meets West in the Conservatory kitchen as we bring together our love for ALL THINGS BRUNCH!

Eggs, meat, bread, crepes and more...


That’s it!

Don’t ask what the inspiration is, just come hungry for some delicious and heartfelt food! 


Course 1

Miso and Caramel Eggplant Galette with Rocket


Course 2

Pho with Crepe Noodles, Pawns, Fish Balls and Fresh Shiitake


Course 3

Smoked Pork Pickle and Labneh with Foccacia


Course 4

Bresaola with œuf Cocotte and Sourdough


Course 5

Chorizo French Toast with Honey and Ice-cream

Menu


Every course is going to start with a shot of sake/soju/wine cocktail


Hamachi in Maanga

Hamachi Sashimi, Raw Mango & Green Chili Ponzu, Chili threads


Bonjiri Ulli Theeyal

Char Grilled Chicken Tali Ulli Theeyal, Onion Soubise


Scallop Moilee

Hokkaido Scallop, Kappa Chips, Moilee Style Coconut Sauce, Curry Leaf Oil


Duck Mappas Tsukune 

Smoked Duck Tsukune, Duck Stock Mappas, Cured Egg Yolk


Kozhi Porichattu

Whole Chicken Leg, Malabar Spices, Wakame Salad


Angamaly Pork/ Beef Don Buri

Coconut Vinegar Rice, Angamaly Style Pork Fry/ Syrian Beef Roast, Cured Egg Yolk, Bamboo Shoot, Curry Leaf Furikake


Pazham Pori

Ripe Banana Tempura, Miso Caramel, Whipped Goat Cheese Ice Cream

document.name: Chefs Karan Upmanyu & Ria Belliappa | Fruits & Vegetables | Double Trouble
document.short_description:
Fruits & Vegetables with Chefs Ria Beliappa & Karan Upmanyu


To celebrate The Conservatory, which has fostered experimentation and creative expression through food for the last two years, we bring you another unconventional dining experience.


Taking inspiration from its botanical setting, modelled after the Lal Bagh greenhouse, this menu plays with the forms and flavours of fruits and vegetables.

 

In our daily lives we use vegetables for savoury dishes, and focus on fruits for sweeter things. This menu aims to challenge that status quo in a fun and playful manner - fruits for dinner and vegetables for dessert!


“Contra la Corriente”


FRUITS & VEGETABLES


FRUITS 


Cherry & Bitter Orange

Loafer’s Seedy Sour Cherry Mostarda, Bitter Orange & Cinnamon Butter


Melon 

Serrano Ham, Melon & Sherry Jelly. 


Mango 

Red Snapper Ceviche, Pickled Mangoes, Mango Leche de Tigre. 


Passion Fruit 

Squid & Prawn, Green Chilli - Passion Fruit Emulsion.


Pineapple

Koji glazed Pork Belly, Pineapple Salsa. 


Apricots, Preserved Lemons & Dates

Lamb Tagine Roulade, Whipped Feta & Braised Fennel. 



VEGETABLES 


Cauliflower

Dulce de Leche, Dill & Walnut. 


Potato 

Chocolate, Bay Leaf, Thyme & Orange 


Beetroot

Caramel, Hazelnut & Brownie.

document.name: Chefs Dina Weber & Brehadeesh Kumar | Arubaito Ranchi  | Double Trouble
document.short_description:
Menu


Poor knight

German milk soaked bun, usually made from stale bread, fried, served with apple relish


Puffer

Farmer and worker lunch that became winter street food, grated potato fritter, served with sour cream and anchovy 


Yakionigiri

Staple Japanese working breakfast. Grilled ball of rice, stuffed with pork an caramelised onions and covered in nori


Smoked salmon sashimi with Meerrettich 

Smoked salmon,Meerrettich (German white radish paste), potesara (German Japanese potato salad), Spargel (pickled asparagus)


Maultasche and dashi 

Pork mince, wrapped in pasta sheet, mackerel bone dashi, black garlic oil māyu


Aji fry and soba schwarzplentene

South German buckwheat dumpling, shiso milk bechamel and panko fried horse mackerel


Matcha Baumkuchen 

German crepe cake (symbolising annual rings of trees) with matcha and white chocolate, black current gel and yoghurt mousse

document.cancellation_policy:
Refunds:

Refunds will be issued only in cases where the event is cancelled by the organizers. Refund requests made by attendees will be considered up to 2 days prior to the event date. A processing fee may apply to refund requests initiated by attendees. Refunds will be processed within 2 business days after approval.

Cancellations:

Attendees must notify the organizers of any cancellations at least 2 days before the event date. Cancellations made after the specified deadline may not be eligible for a refund. The organizers reserve the right to cancel or reschedule the event due to unforeseen circumstances. In such cases, attendees will be notified promptly, and refunds will be issued accordingly.

Transfer of Tickets:

Tickets are non-transferable without prior approval from the organizers. Requests for ticket transfers must be made in writing and approved by the organizers.

No-show Policy:

Attendees who do not show up for the event without prior notice will not be eligible for a refund. By registering for the event, attendees agree to abide by the refund and cancellation policy outlined above. The organizers reserve the right to amend or update this policy as necessary.

document.short_description:
Join us for a casual Sunday Breakfast Table to make new friends and enjoy great conversation! Whether you're new to town or just looking to expand your social circle, all are welcome. We’ll have a variety of breakfast items, coffee, and good company.

﻿Come and share your stories, interests, and make new friends.

document.address: 167, GROUND FLOOR BACK PORTION 2nd Stage, 2nd cross, Shankarnag Rd, Stage 2, Domlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560071, India
document.booking_confirmation_message:
We are so excited to welcome you the STUDIO by Copper + Cloves.


You will be attending one of the first ever yoga events at our new studio!


Mary is an experienced yoga teacher who will guide you through a beautiful slow practice focused on building strength. Following which we'll have a picnic-style brunch all together. We will start at 8.30am sharp so please do come early and find your place.


Please note the location is NOT the usual Copper + Cloves cafe address. Our new location can be found here:

https://maps.app.goo.gl/6cFaG7uLZBgLo5bs6?g_st=com.google.maps.preview.copy

  • You will see signs for Chakra, Krumb Kraft and Blush & Brush- we are in the same building.
  • Use the side alley to the right of Blush & Brush, and come up to the 4th floor by the lift! We'll see you up here.



There is very limited parking in the nearby side streets, if possible get a drop off as it can be difficult to find nearby parking. To respect our neighbours, please do not park in front of nearby driveways and gates. Wherever possible take a cab.

document.name: Yoga Brunch at the STUDIO by Copper + Cloves

custom_questions.question: Do you have any allegies?

document.short_description:
Join us for the best possible start to your Sunday!


A 60 minute Hatha practice with Mary followed by a nourishing delicious brunch by Copper + Cloves including smoothie bowls and buddha bowls. We'll be giving you previews of our new cafe menu!


Be the first to practice in the STUDIO by Copper + Cloves - we're only just opening and we are excited to have you!

default_section.text:
60 minute yoga session
Nourishing brunch spread
